job.title: Embedded Software Engineer

LabsltugtltpgtltpgtTechnology has changed daily life in a way no one could have imaginedampnbspIts made us more productive capable and connectedampnbspBut it has come at a costampnbspWere productive but overwhelmedampnbspCapable but paralyzed by too many choicesampnbspConnected but only if social media countsampnbspLiving this way creates a void in our daily livesampnbspYo Labs is here to change thatampnbspOur team is committed to alleviating the mental load that our modern world has created by putting human connection back into technology and caretaking at the heart of everything we createltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Get to DoltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtYou will work in a small team of device software engineers to build new IoT enabled devices You are expected to be a handson tech lead with demonstrable experience in leading small teams or large complexity components who excel in a dynamic fastmoving and agile environment building high quality high performance and scalable software You will be expected to work equally between design handson development and providing mentorship to other developers within the organization You should have experience leading the development of embedded device software on RTOS or Linux class devices This engineer should have deep experience with all aspects of embedded platform software including boot loaders kernels and several related device drivers This engineering tech lead also requires a solid understanding of embedded security IP networking protocols and will be expected to implement rapid prototypes on a variety of hardware An understanding of factory processes and related security would be a plus You should also have a demonstrable track record of working closely with mobile apps services and PM teams with high quality products that have already launchedltpgtltulgtltligtBuild robust and scalable embedded device side software with trusted securityltligtltligtIndependently plan software milestones and release schedulesltligtltligtDesign develop test deploy and maintain device IoT software in the fieldltligtltligtCollaborate with other engineering teams PM and UX teamsltligtltligtTech Lead may coordinate a small team of engineers while mentoring othersltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll BringltugtltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltugtEducation ampamp ExperienceltugtltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPreferably ampgt 10 years experience building embedded software with C C Java
